title: Peter Schiff Explains ‘How Bitcoin Works’, Crypto Community Responds
description: On January 24, Peter Schiff, a well-known financial commentator and one of the harshest critics of cryptocurrency, took to social media platform X to express his skepticism about Bitcoin. title: SEC Delays Decision On BlackRock’s Spot Ethereum ETF To March
description: The United States Securities and Exchange Commission has delayed its decision on BlackRock’s spot Ethereum ETF to March.

title: BlackRock’s Ethereum ETF Hit by SEC Delay; Approval May Take Until May
description:
The introduction of spot Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) seems to be taking time, as the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has delayed its decision on BlackRock’s application. This further postpones the potential for wider investor access to the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency. The SEC, in a recent filing, cited the need for “sufficient time to consider” […]
